DOC.brief_summary: Up 24 subject enrol treat . Enrolled subject receive two Ulthera® treatment , 90 day apart . Follow-up visit occur 90 , 180 , 270 day follow last treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , immediately post-treatment , follow-up visit .
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , single-blinded , randomize , split-body clinical study conduct one clinical site . Investigator assess baseline buttock ptosis confirm subject eligibility . Enrolled subject meet entrance criterion confirm eligible study treatment randomized/assigned one two treatment group : `` Right side treat '' `` Left side treat '' . All subject receive two , single-sided , dual-depth Ultherapy® treatment use 4-4.5mm 7-3.0mm transducer 0.90J 0.30J , respectively . Standardized image take use standard 2D Vectra 3D digital image system . Subjects complete study visit give option receive two balance treatment , 90 day apart , require complete one study visit 90 day follow last balancing treatment . Quantititative qualititative assessment pre- versus post-treatment buttock ptosis complete post-treatment time point . Subjects also complete questionnaire study visit .
